document_data.name: Jenis Glowarm
document_data.mainbody: '''Jenis Glowarm''' was a [[Harper]] agent and the proprietor of the [[Crying Claw]] tavern in the city of [[Arrabar]], [[Vilhon Reach]], in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Jenis Glowarm was known for her glowing smile, found behind the Crying Claw's bar every night. She playfully winked and charmed the Claw's guests with her natural charisma.
document_data.History:
Some time ''circa'' {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the Crying Claw fell into the hands of Jenis Glowarm, who was rumored to be a member of Those Who Harp. Her management was so successful that the tavern saw significant quality improvements within a single year.

By the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, Jenis became friendly with [[Vambran Matrell]] of the [[Order of the Sapphire Crescent]], one of her tavern's regulars. Jenis was helped by three assistants and a small army of athletic servers.
